title: Pineapple Salsa Pork Chops
directions: Preheat oven to 425°. In a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil.
Season pork chops with salt and
pepper and add to skillet. Sear until
skillet to oven and bake until cooked
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, toss pineapple, bell pepper, red and green
onions, lime juice, and the 2 remaining
tablespoons of the oil until combined.
Let chops rest 5 minutes, then top with pineapple salsa before serving.
